snippet: Slovakia stunned Spain, 2-1, in European Championship qualifying Thursday, breaking the run of 14 straight away wins for the titleholder.
abstract: Slovakia stuns Spain, 2-1, in European Championship qualifying breaking the run of 14 straight away wins for the titleholder; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Slovakia stunned Spain, 2-1, in European Championship qualifying Thursday, breaking the run of 14 straight away wins for the titleholder.
